Name: SPACE DANCE
About the game: Space Dance is a space simulator presented in the Galaga genre from the 90s, control a space ship against the alien invaders of the planet trying to take over the population of the earth for enslavement. features: 3 types of weapons 15 challenging levels random events to make the game more difficult
